description:
Wacom tablet indicator in the top bar: connection state and power level.

 On click: open GNOME Settings Wacom section. On hover or every minute: update connection state and power level.

 Settings (in extension.js file headers): show/hide model label, refresh delay, update/do nothing on indicator hover, show/hide if disconnected.
